entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
